translation.en: [woman] I can't come over, Todd. I'm babysitting.
translation.zh: ‎我没办法过去 托德 我在看小孩呢

translation.en: Yeah, I finally got her to fall asleep. Took forever, though.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我终于把她哄睡了
‎但是花了我好长时间

translation.en: I mean, I've never seen a kid so scared of her own toys. [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎我从没见过像她这样
‎这么害怕自己的玩具的小孩

translation.en: [girl] It's not a nightmare, Monster Girl. Just your life.
translation.zh:
‎你不是在做恶梦 妖怪女孩
‎这就是你的人生

translation.en: [teacher] Miss Ferguson, I know you skipped a grade in math,
translation.zh:
‎佛格森小姐
‎我知道你数学成绩很好 跳级了

translation.en: That doesn't mean you can sleep through my class.
translation.zh: ‎但这并不代表你可以在我的课上睡觉

translation.en: Then calculate the volume of that object using the proper formula.
translation.zh:
‎那就用正确的公式
‎计算一下那个物体的体积

translation.en: -♪ It can't get better than this… ♪ -Thanks.
-I didn't say to take a wild guess. -That's not a wild guess.
but I decided to round up.
-♪ What would they say instead… ♪ -[echoing] Hey! Look who it is.
Am I always gonna be known as the Monster Girl?
translation.zh: ‎大家会一直叫我“妖怪女孩”吗？

translation.en: Well, I mean, you did tell people that a monster attacked you. So…
translation.zh:
‎你的确告诉过大家
‎你被妖怪袭击过 所以…
‎是啊 那是我五岁的事了

translation.en: You ate crayons when we were kids. No one calls you Crayola Mouth.
translation.zh:
‎小时候你还老吃蜡笔呢
‎怎么没人叫你蜡笔嘴？

translation.en: Let's face it, monsters aren't real.
translation.zh: ‎面对现实吧 妖怪不是真的

translation.en: Oh, my God. Even my best friend thinks I'm crazy.
translation.zh: ‎天哪 连我最好的朋友都觉得我疯了

translation.en: Yeah. You are crazy. That's why you're my best friend.
translation.zh:
‎没错 你是疯了
‎所以你才是我最好的朋友

translation.en: -[crash] -[boy] Hey! Give me my wig back!

translation.zh:
‎你明白规矩的 贾斯伯
‎不允许穿戴夸张服饰

translation.en: -There's no costumes allowed. -Hah! Yeah? It's Halloween!
translation.zh:
‎你明白规矩的 贾斯伯
‎不允许穿戴夸张服饰 ‎是吗？这可是万圣节！
‎这样的规定是违宪的

‎是吗？这可是万圣节！
‎这样的规定是违宪的

translation.en: All right? Big time Halloween party at mine tonight!
translation.zh:
‎好吗？今晚在我家
‎举办大型万圣节派对

translation.en: Costumes are not only allowed, they're mandatory! -[cheering] -Okay?
translation.zh:
‎不仅允许化装
‎而且必须要化装才能出席！好吗？

translation.en: We should totally go to that party.
I don't know. Jesper is a senior. We're only freshmen.
translation.zh:
‎我不确定 贾斯伯是毕业班学生
‎我们才高一

translation.en: Kelly, it's Halloween. The one night we can be anything we want.
translation.zh:
‎凯莉 这可是万圣节
‎我们可以装扮成任何样子的唯一机会

translation.en: Anything in the world. What do you wanna be?
translation.zh: ‎想装扮成什么都行 你想扮成什么？

translation.en: Oh, we are so going to that party.
translation.zh: ‎哦 我们必须要去参加那个派对

translation.en: Oh, just… makin' a Halloween costume.
Uh-- Halloween party at a friend's house.
And you were planning on going?
I may have suggested that you would…
translation.zh: ‎我可能提了一句你会帮忙看小孩

‎我可能提了一句你会帮忙看小孩 ‎-帮泽尔曼女士
‎-你老板？

translation.en: -The Ice Queen? -Uh, yes, but don't-- don't call her that.
translation.zh: ‎冰太后？ ‎没错 但你别当面这么叫她

translation.en: Well, my company Halloween party is tonight,
translation.zh: ‎我们公司今晚要举办万圣节派对

translation.en: and I overheard Ms. Zellman complaining that she couldn't find a sitter,
translation.zh:
‎我无意中听到泽尔曼女士抱怨说
‎她找不到保姆了

translation.en: so I thought-- Well, I thought you could…
translation.zh: ‎所以我就想着…我就想着你可以…

translation.en: So, you threw my name out there to babysit?
translation.zh: ‎所以你就提出我可以帮忙看孩子？

translation.en: -Dad! Mom sold me out to her boss! -[sighs]
translation.zh: ‎爸爸！妈妈把我出卖给她老板了！

translation.en: -[Dad] Listen to your mother, Kelly. -[Kelly scoffs]
-Thanks for havin' my back, Dad! -[Dad] No problem, sweetie.
translation.zh:
‎-多谢你支持我了 爸爸！
‎-不客气 亲爱的

translation.en: You know, I can barely keep my phone charged,
translation.zh: ‎我忙到都没时间给自己的手机充电

translation.en: let alone take care of some kid.
[sighs] Now, if I cancel on Ms. Zellman, she'll be furious.
translation.zh:
‎如果我和泽尔曼女士说你去不了
‎她会气疯了的

translation.en: [whispers] This is the Ice Queen we're talking about.

translation.zh:
‎-但是…
‎-再说 只是帮忙看孩子而已

‎-…对你很有帮助 而且…
‎-可是…

translation.en: …you'll make 15 dollars an hour. You can totally do this, sweetie!
translation.zh:
‎…每小时你还能赚15美元
‎你绝对可以做到的 宝贝！

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you! You're gonna be great!
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 你一定会表现得很好的！

translation.en: I-- I-- I mean, your costume is-- it's literally--
translation.zh: ‎我是指你的万圣节服装 就是…

translation.en: I printed up a list of no-no's.
"No ice cream, no gluten, no caffeine, no dairy, no peanuts,
translation.zh:
‎“不能摄入冰淇淋、麸质、咖啡因
‎奶制品和花生

translation.en: no more than 30 minutes of screen time"?
translation.zh: ‎使用屏幕的时间不能超过30分钟”

translation.en: You have a stopwatch on your cell phone, right?

translation.zh:
‎-我觉得…
‎-考虑到今天是万圣节

translation.en: Jacob may have three pieces of candy.
-Oh! I've got some-- -No, no, no, no.
Raisins, dried apple chips, or puffed rice cakes.
translation.zh: ‎只能是葡萄干、苹果干或膨化米饼

translation.en: no discussing global tragedies or current events.
translation.zh: ‎不许讨论全球性的灾难或时事

translation.en: Poison control, his doctor, his dentist.
translation.zh: ‎中毒控制中心、他的医生和牙医
‎还有他的入睡准备步骤清单

translation.en: It takes three hours just to put him to sleep?
If he goes to sleep at all.
-Halloween's scary. -It'll be okay, honey. I promise.
translation.zh:
‎-万圣节好吓人的
‎-没事的 宝贝 我保证

translation.en: Your muzzie-wuzzie loves you so much.
I'll be home at midnight. Follow the list.
translation.zh: ‎我会在午夜12点回来 照着清单做

translation.en: Lock the doors. And no trick-or-treaters.
translation.zh:
‎锁好门
‎不许招呼“不给糖就捣蛋”的人

translation.en: Don't put me to bed! I can't go to sleep.

translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-因为我会做很可怕的恶梦

translation.en: that comes out of my fish tank.
translation.zh: ‎那个东西会从我的鱼缸里爬出来

translation.en: It feels like it's coming to get me, but Mom says it's just a nightmare.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得它想抓住我
‎但妈妈说只是做恶梦而已

translation.en: I actually know a lot about nightmares.

translation.zh: ‎有时候 恶梦就是感觉很像真的

translation.en: But it's just your mind playing tricks on you.
translation.zh: ‎但是 这只是你的脑子在捉弄你

translation.en: Mine can. I can make monsters.
translation.zh:
‎我的恶梦就可以伤害我
‎我能造出妖怪来

translation.en: There's no such thing as monsters.
-What happened to Tedster? -I dreamt he was on fire.
translation.zh: ‎熊宝宝怎么了？ ‎我梦到他着火了

translation.en: And when I woke up, he was.
translation.zh: ‎然后我醒过来 发现他真的着火了

translation.en: [Tedster, slowly] I want to hug you.

translation.zh:
‎-我不喜欢他的拥抱
‎-你知道吗？

translation.en: If it makes you feel any better,
when I was a little kid,
translation.zh: ‎我可以告诉你 我小时候

translation.en: I thought my bad dreams could come true too.
Now I'm just scared of real-life stuff,
translation.zh: ‎现在我开始害怕现实世界的东西了

translation.en: like climate change, and inequality, and talking to boys,
translation.zh: ‎比如气候变化、不平等、和男孩说话

translation.en: and, like, everything I read on Twitter. It's really scary.
translation.zh:
‎还有我在推特上看到的一切
‎真的很吓人

translation.en: How about… I check under your bed?
translation.zh: ‎那要不我帮你检查一下床下面？

translation.en: Okay, but don't turn off the lights!
You know what I do when I get scared of the dark?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我怕黑的时候会怎么做吗？

translation.en: These… are my own personal night-lights.
-[dance music playing] -[Kelly] All right, engage my FOMO.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 快来缓解一下我的错失恐惧症

translation.en: I am the crown jewel of nutritious snacks.
translation.zh: ‎我是营养小吃界的皇冠之珠

translation.en: You gotta get over here, Kelly.
translation.zh: ‎你最好赶紧赶过来 凯莉

translation.en: Deanna is about to walk that plank.
translation.zh: ‎迪安娜马上可就要拿下那个海盗了

translation.en: -Go get 'em, Tommy. -[Tommy] All right. I-- I'd love to.
translation.zh:
‎-快去吧 汤米
‎-好的 我很乐意和你跳

translation.en: Look at what you've done here.
Your Gift of Dreams bringing nightmares to life.
translation.zh: ‎你的圆梦超能力让恶梦变成了现实
‎好样的 雅各布 好样的

translation.en: Enunciate, darling. Try using your words.
translation.zh:
‎发音清晰一点 亲爱的
‎尝试用语言来表达

translation.en: Just a tentacle? Not attached to anything.
translation.zh:
‎只是一个触角？
‎没有连接到别的东西上

translation.en: Now that's an outside the box nightmare, even for me.
translation.zh: ‎真是一个创意十足的恶梦 ‎即使以我的标准来看

translation.en: You and I are about to unleash your nightmares on the world.
translation.zh:
‎让我们两个人一起
‎把你的恶梦释放到世界中去

translation.en: Hi. These-- these things just took the kid I was babysitting.
translation.zh: ‎喂 这些东西把我照看的小孩劫走了

translation.en: Yes, I am aware it's Halloween night, but this… this is not a joke.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我知道今天是万圣节 ‎但我没有开玩笑

translation.en: This is serious. These were proper creatures of the night, they-- they--
translation.zh: ‎我是认真的 它们真的是夜间的怪兽…

translation.en: Liz Lerue. Babysitter. We got a nightmare ping come from here.
translation.zh: ‎丽兹·拉卢 保姆 ‎我们收到这里传来的恶梦警报声

translation.en: I'll be the judge of that. [sighs] Where's your charge?

translation.en: The human being you're supposed to be responsible for?
These things came out from under the bed.
translation.zh: ‎这些东西从床底下跑了出来

translation.en: Look, I tried calling the police, but they thought it was a prank.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我试过报警 他们以为是恶作剧

translation.en: -Hey! You can't go in there! -What'd these things look like?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿！你不能进去！
‎-这些东西长什么样？

translation.en: Um, they were small and fat, with crazy teeth and weird hair.
translation.zh:
‎又小又胖 还有疯子一样的牙齿
‎和奇怪的头发

translation.en: What were they wearing? Did they have eyes?
Um, they were two to three feet high. Uh, claws.
They had weird mouths and two eyes, lopsided.
translation.zh: ‎长着奇怪的嘴和两只高低不平的眼睛

translation.en: What's a "Toadie"? Also, whose baby is that?
translation.zh:
‎“蟆怪”是什么？
‎还有 这是谁的宝宝？

translation.en: Is it yours? I'm not judging if it is.
translation.zh: ‎是你的吗？如果是 我不会妄加评论

translation.en: This is Carmella. -Carmella, say hi. Don't be shy. -[gurgles]
translation.zh:
‎这是卡梅拉
‎卡梅拉 打个招呼吧 别害羞

translation.en: I'm babysitting her because that's what actual babysitters do.
translation.zh:
‎我在看管她
‎因为真正的保姆就会这么做

translation.en: We watch and protect our kids.
translation.zh: ‎我们会照看并保护好负责的孩子

translation.en: Now, stand over there and play the quiet game.
translation.zh: ‎好了 去那边站着 保持安静

translation.en: [Liz] You're like a calculator. What time are the parents home?
translation.zh:
‎你就像个人肉计算器
‎家长什么时候到家？

translation.en: [Kelly] Midnight. His mom is very intense. She would never be late.
translation.zh:
‎午夜十二点 她妈妈很紧张他 ‎-绝对不会晚回来
‎-好的 待在这里

‎-绝对不会晚回来
‎-好的 待在这里

translation.en: chew your hair, find out what you'd look like with dog ears, I don't care.
translation.zh:
‎啃啃头发 试试狗耳朵滤镜功能 ‎随你便 我不在乎
‎但是 如果妈妈打电话来

translation.en: But if the mom calls, you act like everything's cool.
translation.zh:
‎随你便 我不在乎
‎但是 如果妈妈打电话来 ‎你必须假扮一切正常 明白吗？
‎你必须假扮一切正常 明白吗？

translation.en: Excuse you! I'm coming with you.
No. You will just get in my way.
Or you'll get possessed, hypnotized, cursed, boiled,
translation.zh:
‎或者你会被附身、被催眠
‎被诅咒、被煮熟 或者被变成

translation.en: or turned into a three-headed dog of darkness.
translation.zh:
‎或者你会被附身、被催眠
‎被诅咒、被煮熟 或者被变成 ‎-一只黑暗三头犬
‎-真的假的？

translation.en: Wait, did you even see this?
They come from out of Jacob's window, run down here, and then they just vanish.
translation.zh:
‎是从雅各布的窗口出来的
‎延续到这里 然后就消失了

translation.en: They don't match the claws that those trollies had--
translation.zh:
‎和那些马怪的爪子 ‎-不吻合…
‎-是蟆怪

translation.en: And they have an entirely different pattern and diameter,
translation.zh: ‎而且是完全不同的图案以及直径

translation.en: which means a completely different thing was here.
translation.zh: ‎这就意味着有另一种生物来过这里

translation.en: -♪ Get ready for the show-ow… ♪ -We've got Toadies on our hands.
Bring me up on the tracker.
Pull up a map of their main tunnels.
translation.zh: ‎把它们主要隧道的地图拿出来

translation.en: No! Not you, just some girl.
translation.zh: ‎不！我没和你说话 是和另一个姑娘

translation.en: GPR activity near Sharkie Park? Copy that.
translation.zh:
‎GPR显示鲨鲨公园附近
‎侦察到行动？收到

translation.en: ♪ And it's gone runnin' ♪ ♪ Trouble's comin' ♪
Toadies have a network of tunnels under the city.
translation.zh:
‎蟆怪在城市地底下
‎有一个隧道网

translation.en: Sometimes our monster GPR picks up their movements.
translation.zh:
‎有时我们的妖怪穿天透地雷达
‎会检测到它们的活动

translation.en: -[Kelly] We're not going in the tunnels. -[Liz] Nope.
translation.zh: ‎我们不会要下到隧道里去吧 ‎不用

translation.en: Like, gross to the third power.
Anyway, look for a hidden tunnel. Should be around here somewhere.
translation.zh: ‎不论如何 找找隐蔽的隧道吧 ‎应该就在这附近

translation.en: -[Kelly] How do you know all this stuff? -[Liz] Check the bag.
translation.zh: ‎你怎么知道这些的？ ‎看看书包里面的东西

translation.en: [Liz] It's a collection of thousands of years' worth
of monster hunting wisdom passed down through the ages.
translation.zh: ‎收录了几千年来传承下来的猎魔智慧
‎所以说 我当时没有发疯

translation.en: Uh, the Toadies dug their tunnel right at the end of the slide,
translation.zh: ‎蟆怪们把洞口直接挖在滑滑梯的尾端

translation.en: so when a kid comes shooting down…
translation.zh: ‎这样 孩子们坐滑滑梯下来就…

‎-也许你可以脱下她的外套？
‎-好

translation.en: -[Kelly] Why do you need baby powder? -[sighs]
"Beware. Toadies love the smell of newborns.
translation.zh: ‎“留意了 蟆怪喜欢新生婴儿的气味
‎完全无法抵御诱惑 要尝一口”

translation.en: One of 'em pops out looking for a snack, boom, got 'em.
translation.zh: ‎肯定会有蟆怪忍不住出来加餐 ‎砰！抓住它们了

translation.en: You're using the baby as bait? No!
Listen, this is the only thing that will get them up to the surface.
translation.zh:
‎听着 这是唯一
‎能让它们爬上地面的东西

translation.en: By the Order of the Babysitters, I demand you return that child!
translation.zh:
‎我以护童保姆国际学会的名义
‎要求你归还那个孩子！

translation.en: Don't worry, Carmella. I'm gonna keep you safe.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 卡梅拉 我会保护你的安全

translation.en: -[growls] -[Liz] Hey, hey! Hey, hey! Look what I've got.
If you give us the boy, you get sparkly.
translation.zh:
‎如果你把那个男孩换给我们
‎我就把这个亮闪闪给你

translation.en: [Liz] Come on, don't play hardball with me.
-[Liz] Jacob or sparkly? -[Kelly] Okay. Hello. Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-选雅各布还是亮闪闪？
‎-好吧 你好啊

translation.en: Oh! You mean-- No. Yeah. Um-- Everything's fine.
translation.zh: ‎哦！你是指…没有 一切都好

translation.en: Jacob and I are having so much fun.
-[Toadie gurgling] -What's that noise? Uh… It's… it's a movie.
That sounds like a scary movie. Check the list, Kelly. No scary movies.
translation.zh:
‎听起来像是吓人的电影 仔细看清单
‎凯莉 不允许看吓人的电影

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no! It's-- it's a fun movie.
-It's about unicorns and rainbows and… -[Toadie chattering and growling]
-A… unicorn fell off a… a rainbow. -[Toadie squealing]
translation.zh: ‎一只独角兽从彩虹上掉了下来

translation.en: [Kelly] But it was saved by a cloud. We're all good here.
translation.zh: ‎但是被一朵云给救了 ‎我们都很好

translation.en: Let me speak to Jacob. Now!
translation.zh:
‎让我和雅各布说话
‎现在就把电话给他！

translation.en: You said you were watching a movie.
No, he just-- he just fell asleep like that.
translation.zh: ‎不 他就这样看着电影时睡着了

translation.en: Tonight is a night of firsts.
translation.zh: ‎今天是充满了各种头一回的晚上

translation.en: [woman] The tenth annual company costume party is about to begin!
translation.zh: ‎第十届年度公司化装大会即将开始！

translation.en: [Ms. Zellman] I'm glad Jacob fell asleep early.
translation.zh: ‎我真的很高兴雅各布提前睡着了

translation.en: [Kelly] I'm gonna be grounded for all of eternity.
So, how are we gonna get him back now?
translation.zh: ‎那我们现在要怎么救他回来？

translation.en: That's why this little creep's comin' with us.
translation.zh: ‎所以这个小东西要跟我们一起去

‎所以这个小东西要跟我们一起去 ‎九点了 卡梅拉
‎我们这就送你回家 宝贝

‎九点了 卡梅拉
‎我们这就送你回家 宝贝

translation.en: The Toadies always trade. This is worse than I thought.
translation.zh:
‎蟆怪总是乐意做交易的
‎情况比我想的还要糟糕

translation.en: The guest of honor has arrived, finally!
I trust your travels were smooth.
-I wanna go home! -You're not going anywhere.
I suppose you want to know how it all works.
translation.zh:
‎你肯定想知道
‎这一切都是怎么运作的吧

translation.en: I've slowly, but surely, accumulated 51 rare gases
translation.zh:
‎我花了很长时间
‎精确地收集了51种稀有的气体

translation.en: and mixed them with the perfect specificity.
translation.zh: ‎按照完美的配比将其混合起来

translation.en: To fill these beautiful tanks with enough power
translation.zh:
‎为了给这些美丽的罐子
‎注入足够的能量

translation.en: to manifest my army of nightmares into actual life!
Aah! Terrors alive like never seen before.
translation.zh: ‎制造出前所未见的鲜活的恐惧

translation.en: All I needed was just one more little tiny ingredient,
a pathetic yet highly imaginative little twerp,
translation.zh:
‎一个可悲的
‎但是非常有想象力的小蠢蛋

translation.en: personified in this case by… well… you, get it?
translation.zh: ‎这次刚好就是你 明白了吗？

translation.en: will conjure an army of infinite nightmares.
You and I are about to ruin the world.
translation.zh: ‎你和我马上就将摧毁整个世界

translation.en: [Kelly] Wow. We got the baby back to her parents just in time.
translation.zh:
‎拜托 我们及时把宝宝
‎送回到父母身边了

translation.en: I hope she wasn't too freaked out.
[Liz] Freaked out? Carmella loves monster hunting.
translation.zh: ‎吓坏？ ‎卡梅拉可喜欢捕猎妖怪了

translation.en: How much did her parents pay for you to look after Carmella?
translation.zh:
‎她父母给你了你多少钱
‎照顾卡梅拉？

translation.en: Is that the going rate these days for using a baby as bait?
translation.zh: ‎这是将宝宝当诱饵的现行标准价吗？

translation.en: Ninety-nine percent of the time, that should've worked.
What are you making? Fifteen dollars an hour?
I trust you're snug as a bug?
Have you ever been hypnotized? It's grand.
-[whimpering] No! Aah! -Stop wriggling, you little worm.
My evil lullaby will put you into a deep, dark sleep.
translation.zh:
‎我邪恶的摇篮曲
‎会让你陷入深沉而黑暗的睡眠

translation.en: -[choir joins in] -♪What a gift, what a sight to behold ♪
translation.zh: ‎多好的天赋 多么惊人的奇观

translation.en: ♪ Child, you'll do as you're told ♪
Aah! Your Gift of Dreams is blocking my lullaby.
translation.zh:
‎啊 肯定是你的圆梦超能力
‎阻碍了我的摇篮曲起作用
‎好样的 雅各布 好样的

translation.en: I have a few tricks up my sleeve.

translation.zh: ‎我一定会让你入睡的 小男孩

translation.en: when my mom wants me to go to sleep…

translation.zh: ‎好的 ‎还有外层是巧克力的咖啡豆

translation.en: Then I'm out like a light.
Do you think I was born yesterday?
♪ Bom, bom-bom Bom-bom-bom-bom-bom-bom-bom… ♪ -[girl laughing] -[boy] Yeah, I know. [girl] Let me on your back!
-We're throwing the Toadie in the trash? -[growling]
translation.zh: ‎我们要把蟆怪扔进垃圾箱里？

translation.en: Yeah. That's exactly what we're doing.
translation.zh: ‎没错 这就是我们要做的

translation.en: ♪ I want you to be mon amour ♪
Welcome to the Rhode Island chapter of the Order of the Babysitters.
translation.zh:
‎欢迎来到
‎护童保姆国际学会罗得岛分会

translation.en: We're part of a super secret organization with chapters all around the world.
translation.zh: ‎我们隶属于一个绝密组织 ‎在全世界都设有分支机构

translation.en: Cleopatra, Merlin, Rosa Parks, all babysitters.
translation.zh:
‎埃及艳后克利奥帕特拉七世、梅林
‎和罗莎·帕克斯都是保姆

‎玛丽亚·塔尔奇夫
‎努尔·艾娜雅特·汗

translation.en: [Liz] Yeah. We've been around for thousands of years.
translation.zh: ‎没错 我们已经存在了几千年
‎你要是向任何人透露我们的位置

translation.en: and I'll feed you to our resident hobgoblin.
translation.zh: ‎我就会把你抓去喂我们的常驻小妖怪

translation.en: Listen up, SITs. Our mission is Jacob Zellman.
translation.zh:
‎听好了 各位保姆实习生
‎我们的目标是雅各布·泽尔曼

translation.en: Five years old, possibly with the Gift of Dreams.
translation.zh: ‎五岁 很有可能拥有圆梦超能力

translation.en: We have three hours and five minutes until his mom gets back
translation.zh:
‎我们还有3小时5分钟的时间
‎然后他妈妈就会回家

translation.en: and finds her little bundle of joy missing.
Nothing new from the surveillance cameras.
Hey, Berna, will you start the laser scan?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 柏娜 开始做激光扫描吧

translation.en: [girl] All right. Let's take a look in this Toadie's pouch.
translation.zh:
‎好了 让我们看看
‎这只蟆怪的口袋里有些什么

translation.en: What the heck? Is that half a duck?
-How big are their pouches? -Who's the human?
translation.zh:
‎-它们的口袋有多大？
‎-这个人类是谁？

translation.en: [girl] And why exactly is she here?
She was with the kid when he got taken.
translation.zh: ‎那个孩子被带走时 她在场

‎-我们需要向她讨教情况
‎-但是…

translation.en: Just search the thing for clues.
translation.zh: ‎你负责从那东西身上找线索就行了
‎真没礼貌 这可不是一个“东西”

translation.en: It's a Monstria Chordata Amphibia Carnivora of the Toadie subspecies.
translation.zh:
‎这可是蟆怪中的
‎妖怪型脊索两栖食肉动物亚种

translation.en: -[sighs] Remove her. -Cassie, this isn't your call.
translation.zh:
‎-把她赶出去
‎-卡丝 这轮不到你决定

translation.en: You're just a Sitter in Training.
I mean, see this? And this?
It's gonna take me hours to remove the items from its pouch.
translation.zh:
‎要把它口袋里的东西全都取出来
‎我得花几个小时

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. So sorry. -[Liz] Follow me.
translation.zh:
‎-我很抱歉 非常抱歉
‎-跟我来

translation.en: Hey. So, this Jacob kid really has the Gift of Dreams?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 所以这个叫雅各布的小孩
‎真的有圆梦超能力？

translation.en: I just told her what Jacob told me.
translation.zh: ‎我只是把雅各布跟我说的话告诉了她

translation.en: I don't even really know what the Gift of Dreams is.
translation.zh: ‎我都不知道圆梦超能力是什么

translation.en: A young kid who is supposed to be able to bring dreams to life.
translation.zh:
‎是据说可以使梦境
‎或者是恶梦变成现实的

translation.en: The Order was founded to protect kids like that.
translation.zh:
‎我们学会创立的目的
‎就是要保护这样的孩子

translation.en: I could tell you a bit more over a cup of coffee, maybe?
translation.zh:
‎也许我可以请你喝杯咖啡
‎再和你多讲讲？

translation.en: Can you make one of your memory potions?
Uh… Yeah. I, uh… I have a passion for potions.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我对于魔药充满了激情

translation.en: -[Kelly] What is that? -It's Minotaur Memory Dust.
Three parts beetle root, one part gnome guano.
translation.zh: ‎三份甲虫根配一份地精排泄物

translation.en: Yet, I have not tested this batch out yet, so I hope I don't fry her brain.
translation.zh:
‎但是那瓶我还没测试过
‎希望不会把她的脑子给烧焦

translation.en: Now, tell us every single detail you remember when Jacob was taken.
translation.zh:
‎告诉我们雅各布被带走时
‎你记得的所有细节

translation.en: Maybe I used too much beetle root?
I heard that song when I was a little girl…
I've been looking for a girl who can make her dreams come to life,
translation.zh:
‎我一直都在找一个
‎能让梦境变成现实的小女孩

translation.en: ♪ Now give into the darkness inside ♪
-[Kelly sings along] -♪ In the clutches of sleep ♪

translation.zh: ‎陷入睡梦的掌控 ‎听好 乖乖听话

translation.en: [man and choir] ♪You'll do as you're told ♪
[Cassie] Why did it stop on the Grand Guignol?
translation.zh: ‎为什么停在了恶梦魔这一页？

translation.en: [boy] He's the Stealer of Dreams, the Bringer of Nightmares.
translation.zh: ‎他是睡梦偷取者 ‎恶梦制造者

translation.en: Legend has it he's collecting bad dreams from kids
translation.zh: ‎据传说记载 他从孩子那里收集恶梦

translation.en: That's him. [Liz] What do you mean?
That's the monster who tried to take me when I was a little girl!
translation.zh:
‎这就是在我小的时候
‎想把我劫走的妖怪！

translation.en: Liz, those prints I found. They were tail marks, just like this.
translation.zh:
‎丽兹 我发现的那些脚印
‎就是尾巴拖过的痕迹 和这个一样

translation.en: I think he's what took Jacob.
This can't be happening. Not again.
translation.zh: ‎这不可能 不可能再次发生

‎你没事吧？ ‎-是这样的 她…
‎-我们没资格代替她讲她的事

translation.en: [Berna] It's not our story to tell, Curtis.
translation.zh:
‎-是这样的 她…
‎-我们没资格代替她讲她的事

translation.en: "The Grand Guignol travels in the Nightmare Realm.
The Boogeypeople are almost impossible to locate when they are in there."
translation.zh:
‎几乎不可能确定
‎妖魔鬼怪在恶梦魔境中的位置”

translation.en: My whole life, my whole life I was told this wasn't real.
translation.zh:
‎我这一辈子 所有人都告诉我
‎这不是真的

translation.en: That it didn't happen. But now…
translation.zh: ‎那些事并没有发生 但现在…

translation.en: -But now… -This is why we don't let normies in here.
translation.zh:
‎这就是为什么
‎我们不欢迎普通人来这里

translation.en: Each of us has been through a monster attack.
translation.zh: ‎我们每个人都经历过妖怪袭击

translation.en: This is from a Class Two Oozer.
translation.zh: ‎这是被二级脓妖袭击留下的

translation.en: [Curtis] Yeah, I've got one of those, too.
translation.zh: ‎是 我也有一个脓妖留下的伤疤

translation.en: -[Curtis] I was impaled by a Brush troll. -[Berna] This is from a vampire rabbit.
translation.zh:
‎-我有一次还被刷刷怪打伤过
‎-这个是吸血鬼兔子惹的祸

‎-小女妖
‎-吸血鬼兔子 ‎-被纸割伤
‎-九头蛇

translation.en: -[Curtis] I got this from a Cloud Serpent. -No one wants to see that, Curtis.
translation.zh:
‎-还有这个云蛇妖弄的…
‎-没人想看那个伤疤 柯提斯

translation.en: To make sure what happened to us never happens to another kid.
translation.zh:
‎我们要确保发生在我们身上的事
‎再也不会发生在其他孩子身上

translation.en: So how do we take down the Grand Guignol?
translation.zh: ‎那我们要怎么才能打倒恶梦魔？

translation.en: Yet the ingredients are crazy combustible.
We're talking, uh, uh… cobalt from Athena's tomb,
translation.zh:
‎我们需要的东西可是包括了
‎“雅典神墓之钴”

‎-这些我们一个都没有
‎-别担心

translation.en: -I have my sources. -[Kelly] And the Monster Punch?
translation.zh:
‎（神秘的斩妖除魔拳） ‎-我有货源
‎-斩妖除魔拳呢？

translation.en: That's the only way to drive the Angel Fire
It's crazy hard to execute, even if you could get near him.
translation.zh: ‎就算能靠近他 也特别难执行

translation.en: There's a solution to every problem.
[Liz] All right. Let's put that to the test.
translation.zh: ‎好的 那我们就试一试这个理论吧
‎柯提斯 去收集需要的原材料

translation.en: Yes! Time to geek out. Follow me!
translation.zh: ‎耶！本极客要大展身手啦 跟我来！

translation.en: [Curtis] No, it's not actually a jump rope.
It's a net made from powerful Stiltskin Thread.
translation.zh: ‎是用强大的史提尔特皮丝做成的网

translation.en: This is the Mist of Hypnos.
One spray can knock a lesser monster out cold.
translation.zh: ‎喷一下就能把一个小一点的妖怪放倒

translation.en: And this… is the Booyah Bear.
Yank the ear and throw. Go ahead.
translation.zh: ‎把耳朵拔下来 然后扔出去 试试吧

translation.en: -[Liz] Don't waste the weapons, Curtis. -[Curtis sighs]

translation.zh:
‎-继续工作吧 实习生们
‎-等一下 凯莉

translation.en: The Cairo chapter found this in a tomb in Egypt.
translation.zh:
‎开罗分部在埃及的一个坟墓里
‎发现了这个

translation.en: We haven't figured out all it can do, but we know it can break any hex or spell.
translation.zh:
‎我们还没有完全研究出它的作用 ‎但我们知道
‎它可以阻挡任何诅咒或咒语

translation.en: Here, take it. It might come in handy.
translation.zh: ‎给你 带着吧 可能会派上用场

translation.en: If you're insisting on coming, you can feed the Toadie.
translation.zh:
‎如果你坚持要和我一起去
‎那你可以喂一下蟆怪

translation.en: -Wait, wait, wait. I don't know how to-- -[Liz] Open it.
translation.zh:
‎-等等 我不知道怎么…
‎-打开就行

translation.en: Did you put a tracker in the trash?
Sure did. And now he'll scramble back to the Grand Guignol.
translation.zh: ‎当然了 ‎现在 他会爬回到恶梦魔身边

translation.en: Finally, we can locate a Boogeyman.
translation.zh: ‎我们终于能锁定恶梦魔的位置了

translation.en: You wanted it to jump out at me.
translation.zh: ‎你是故意要让它突然往我身上跳的

translation.en: We are trying to rescue Jacob, Kelly.
translation.zh: ‎我们是在努力救回雅各布 凯莉

translation.en: [Grand Guignol] Gnome Street? What are you doing there?

translation.zh: ‎这年头怎么都不肯好好说话

translation.en: No, don't bring them here, you smell-feast.
translation.zh: ‎不行 别把她们带到这里来 ‎你个臭烘烘的家伙

translation.en: I have a dear friend right around the corner from you.
translation.zh: ‎我有个朋友就在离你不远的地方

translation.en: Lead them there and inform him…
translation.zh: ‎把她们引到那里去 然后告诉他…

translation.en: ah, the babysitter buffet is officially open.
The tracker says the Toadie's close by.
[Kelly] It's the next driveway on your right.
translation.zh: ‎就在你右手边的下一个空地

translation.en: -♪ Oh, watchin' her move… ♪ -Come on, baby! Yes!
-Oh, no. No, no, no, no, no, no, no. -What?
-This is Jesper Huang's party. -Bunch of sweaty teenagers?
translation.zh: ‎这是贾斯伯·黄的派对 ‎一帮汗津津的青少年？

translation.en: Place must smell like a smorgasbord to a monster.
translation.zh:
‎在妖怪眼里
‎这就像是一顿瑞典式自助餐

translation.en: Come on. Toadie's in there somewhere. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 蟆怪就在里面 我们走吧

translation.en: My crush is right there, and I'm covered in dirt,
translation.zh: ‎我暗恋的人就在那儿 而我满身是土

translation.en: and smell like trash, and I wore the exact same sweater to school today.
translation.zh:
‎身上一股垃圾的味道
‎还穿着今天去学校穿的毛衣

translation.en: Victor Colleti is not "just a dude."
translation.zh:
‎维多·克拉提
‎可不是“就是个男生而已”

translation.en: And Deanna's here. Great! She looks amazing, of course.
translation.zh:
‎迪安娜也在这里 好极了
‎她看起来超级漂亮 当然了

‎（抱歉我消失了
‎和性感妹子一起走了！）

translation.en: Liz, I can't go in there. I'm having major anxiety.
translation.zh:
‎丽兹 我不能进去
‎我的焦虑症要发作了

translation.en: I mean, you're more scared of a mean girl and some dude than a monster?
translation.zh:
‎和妖怪比起来
‎你更害怕一个刻薄女孩和一个男生？

translation.en: Well, that girl you pointed to looks far from amazing.
translation.zh:
‎你刚刚指的那个女孩
‎看起来有很多问题

translation.en: I mean, she's wearing a cat costume.
every basic girl who has thought that she's hot
translation.zh: ‎每一个觉得自己很性感的无趣的女孩

translation.en: -has worn a cat costume. -♪ I was lost in the rhythm… ♪
[sighs] And the guy, sure, he's eye candy. I get it.
translation.zh:
‎那个男的嘛 当然 他是长得很美
‎我明白你的意思

translation.en: But that is not what is important right now.
translation.zh: ‎但现在 这不是重要的事

translation.en: You're obviously smart. Act like it.
translation.zh: ‎你显然很聪明 拿出聪明的样子来

translation.en: [Jesper] Everyone, Monster Girl's here! -[girl] Monster Girl! -[Jesper] Now it's a Halloween party!
translation.zh:
‎大家 妖怪女孩来了！
‎这下子终于像是个万圣节派对了！

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. It's-- it's the worst.
Is that your-- is that-- is that your costume?
Yeah, I-- I went as myself. Went meta.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我装扮成自己的样子来了
‎表达一番自我认知

translation.en: Don't be that girl. Come on, focus. Toadie's down here somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎别老想着他了 集中注意力
‎蟆怪就在这下面某个地方

translation.en: -Liz, I'm not cool. -Just take the net. Sh!
-Are we going on three, or after three? -Three!
translation.zh:
‎-数到三就行动还是等数完三？
‎-三！
‎是个陷阱 黑影游魂 生活在黑暗中

translation.en: It lives in the dark. We'll be fine as long as the light stays on.
translation.zh: ‎是个陷阱 黑影游魂 生活在黑暗中 ‎只要灯还亮着 我们就不会有事
‎别担心 ‎因为贾斯伯·黄永远都有所准备！
‎因为贾斯伯·黄永远都有所准备！

translation.en: I'll get the Toadie. You handle that.
translation.zh: ‎我去抓蟆怪 你搞定那个

translation.en: Check the guide. Strengths, weaknesses, how to defeat them, it's all in there.
translation.zh:
‎查阅一下攻略
‎找出它的优势和弱点 ‎怎么打败它们 里面都有写

translation.en: Ah. Shadow Monster. Hates bright light.
Hey, is everything okay down here?
-[screeches] -Uh, yeah, everything's-- Everything's fine down here. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是的 下面一切都好 没错

translation.en: Don't come down here. Um, is there punch?
Let's get some punch. I'm thirsty. -Are you thirsty? -Am I?
translation.zh:
‎我们去拿点潘趣酒喝吧 我渴了
‎你渴了吗？

translation.en: You brought your homework to the party?
translation.zh: ‎你带着家庭作业来参加派对？

translation.en: Catching up with, uh… with-- with bio.
You know, catching up, and extra credit. Not that extra credit makes you a nerd--
translation.zh:
‎你懂的 补课 额外加分的项目
‎当然额外加分不代表你就是书呆子…

translation.en: Not that you're a nerd if you do extra--
translation.zh: ‎你当然不是书呆子 你其实很…

translation.en: Oh. You're here, too. How anti-fabulous.
-You know this is a costume party, right? -She came as herself. Very meta.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道这是化装派对吧？
‎-她装扮成她自己来的 表达自我认知

translation.en: 'Cause you're gonna love it when you're dancing with me.
translation.zh: ‎因为你肯定会很喜欢和我一起跳舞的

translation.en: -Kelly, where are you going? -Finally. I thought she'd never leave.
translation.zh:
‎-凯莉 你要去哪儿？
‎-终于 我还以为她赖着不走了

translation.en: Victor. Oh, my gosh, you scared me.
translation.zh: ‎维多 天哪 你吓到我了

translation.en: Um, I was gonna ask you, when we were at the-- at the table…
translation.zh:
‎我刚刚在桌旁 ‎-本来是想问你…
‎-什么？

translation.en: -Why aren't you wearing your costume? -Oh! Um…
translation.zh: ‎你为什么没有穿装扮的服饰来？

translation.en: -Okay… -And I will meet you in one second.
-Oh, come on! -[Victor] Hey, do you want me to come out?
translation.zh:
‎-哦 拜托！
‎-嘿 你想要我出来吗？

translation.en: Hey, everyone! Take a picture of this!
translation.zh: ‎嘿 大家！拿出手机好好拍一下吧！

translation.en: Oh! Do not try that at home, kids.
translation.zh: ‎可别在家轻易尝试哦 小朋友们
‎多谢你给我们表演怪胎秀了

translation.en: Hey, make fun of her one more time.
[Jacob] Hey! I'm still awake over here.
I need something more powerful to get this wretched boy to sleep.
translation.zh:
‎我需要一些更厉害的东西
‎才能让这倒霉孩子入睡
‎什么？不行 不能搞死他 ‎你个蠢蛋

translation.en: Wait. Hah! That's it. Of course! What a brilliant idea.
translation.zh:
‎慢着 这就是了
‎当然了 多么出色的想法

translation.en: Little creep slobbered all over my hands.
translation.zh: ‎那个变态口水流得我手上都是

translation.en: -[Kelly] Ugh. -[Liz] Found it in his pouch.
-[Kelly] I wonder where it's from. -[fireworks exploding]
Sorry, you can't see me. I'm at-- Chh--
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 你看不到我 我在…

translation.en: Then why am I looking at pictures of you
diving off a balcony on Instagram?
translation.zh: ‎看到了你从露台上跳下来的照片？

translation.en: -She knows! -You're at that party, aren't you?
translation.zh:
‎-她知道了！
‎-你去参加派对了 是不是？

translation.en: Please tell me that you didn't abandon Mrs. Zellman's child to go to a party!
translation.zh:
‎拜托你告诉我 你没有抛弃
‎泽尔曼女士的孩子 去参加派对！

translation.en: -[Kelly] Of course I didn't! -[gasps] Her voice went high.
translation.zh: ‎我当然没有！ ‎她的声音变尖了 她在撒谎！她…

translation.en: She's lying! She-- Do Track My Kids.
translation.zh: ‎她的声音变尖了 她在撒谎！她… ‎打开“儿童定位器”

translation.en: Berna, we're gonna need some help around here.
translation.zh: ‎柏娜 我们需要一些帮助

translation.en: On it. What's her mom's e-mail?
translation.zh: ‎收到 她妈妈的邮箱地址是什么？

translation.en: It's the green one. In the next page.
translation.zh: ‎是绿色的一个应用 在下一页上

translation.en: -Peter, it's the green one. Next page. -Shh!
translation.zh:
‎-彼得 是绿色的应用 翻到下一页
‎-泽尔曼女士会听到你说话的

translation.en: -[whispers] Mrs. Zellman will hear you. -[laughs] Oh! Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-彼得 是绿色的应用 翻到下一页
‎-泽尔曼女士会听到你说话的 ‎嗨

translation.en: Well, you are at the Zellmans'.
Yeah, Mom. I-- Uh, yeah, I told you.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 妈妈 我就是这么告诉你的
‎好了 我们得走了 拜拜！

translation.en: There has gotta be something we're not thinking of.
translation.zh: ‎我们肯定还有什么没想到的方面
‎柏娜 哪里有恶梦警报声吗？

‎-没有 丽兹
‎-行吧 那意味着…

translation.en: That means Jacob's still awake, which means…
translation.zh:
‎那就意味着雅各布还醒着
‎也就是说…

translation.en: the Grand Guignol can't get him to sleep.
So how does a Boogeyman get a kid like Jacob to go to sleep?
translation.zh:
‎妖魔怪要如何让雅各布这样的孩子
‎入睡呢？

‎-柯提斯？
‎-好 让我看看他能搞到什么

translation.en: We have the Grit of the Sandman,
Oh! Uh, uh… Cat's Eye Amulet.
Liz, you're not gonna like this.
translation.zh: ‎丽兹 这个答案你不会喜欢的

translation.en: -Curtis, any luck with the Angel Fire? -♪ Like a boss… ♪
translation.zh: ‎柯提斯 天使神火的进度如何？

translation.en: -Getting the ingredients now, boss. -♪ Like a boss… ♪
translation.zh: ‎我正在找寻原材料 老大 ‎（布宜诺斯艾利斯）

translation.en: [in Spanish] The petrified scales of a Kaluga Sturgeon?
Mm. That might be a little hard this time of year.
[in Hindi] I might be able to find some ground-up Mastodon tooth.
translation.zh: ‎我也许能找到一些乳齿象的象牙粉

translation.en: [in English] Possibly. But I'm not doing the grinding.
translation.zh: ‎有可能 但我不会帮你磨成粉

translation.en: [man on phone, in Spanish] Chupacabra venom? In October?
translation.zh: ‎卓柏卡布拉毒液？ ‎在10月要找这个？

translation.en: I was really hoping you had some Icarus Wing.
translation.zh: ‎我真的希望你们那儿有伊卡洛斯翼

translation.en: [Curtis, in English] Please tell me that you do.
[in Japanese] I'll see what I can do.
[Kelly] So, what do I need to know about this Cat Lady?
translation.zh:
‎关于这个猫夫人
‎我需要知道些什么吗？

translation.en: [Liz] She's an ex silent movie star turned class five witch.
translation.zh:
‎她曾经是默片女明星
‎然后变成了五级女巫

translation.en: Last year, she and the Grand Guignol teamed up
translation.zh: ‎去年 她和恶梦魔一起组队

translation.en: and almost destroyed the whole babysitter chapter in Nepal.
translation.zh: ‎差点毁掉了学会的整个尼泊尔分部

translation.en: And she once fed an entire Girl Scout troop to her cats.
translation.zh:
‎她有次还把一整队的女童军
‎都喂了她的猫

translation.en: Here's the thing. I… I'm kind of allergic to cats.
translation.zh: ‎事情是这样的 我对猫过敏

translation.en: [Liz] It's fine. It's the only way we're gonna get back Kevin.
translation.zh:
‎没事的 这是我们唯一
‎能救回凯文的机会
‎你是指雅各布吧 凯文是谁？

translation.en: The Grand Guignol took your brother?
I was six, Kevin was five.
There was a scratch at the window.
I thought it was a tree branch or the wind.
I jumped out of bed, drew back the curtains…
and that's when I saw him.
He sang us a song, and I fell under a spell.
translation.zh: ‎他给我们唱了首歌 我中了他的咒语

translation.en: When I came to, Kevin was gone. I never saw my brother again.
translation.zh:
‎等我清醒过来之后 凯文就不见了
‎我再也没见过我的弟弟

translation.en: I've been looking for him my whole life.
I mean, that's the reason I became a babysitter.
-It-- it wasn't your fault. -No one believes that.
translation.zh:
‎-那不是你的错
‎-没人相信这一点

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like.
To feel helpless? Out of control?
Like nobody believes you but there's nothing you can do?
translation.zh:
‎感到没有人相信你
‎你也完全没办法改变这一点？

translation.en: He came for me when I was a little kid, and no one even listened.
translation.zh: ‎我小时候他来抓过我 ‎没人愿意听我倾诉

translation.en: But you know what changed things?
translation.zh: ‎但你知道是什么改变了这些吗？

translation.en: We get in. You distract Peggy.
translation.zh: ‎我们溜进去 你转移佩姬的注意力

translation.en: I spray her. We grab the amulet. We split.
translation.zh:
‎我拿这个喷她
‎我们拿到迷魂猫眼坠 然后就开溜

translation.en: -[cat yowls] -Let's just get this over with.
[Kelly] So, how many cats does she have?

translation.zh: ‎这儿有几只 那儿有几只

translation.en: -♪ You kiss too nicely… ♪ -What can I do for you ladies?
translation.zh: ‎我能为你们做点什么吗 女士们？

translation.en: -Looking for a room? -♪ You might entice me… ♪
[Liz] How do you know who I am?

translation.zh: ‎妖怪都认识猎捕妖怪的保姆
‎可得知己知彼才行 不是吗？

translation.en: Not too great under pressure now, are you, Liz?
translation.zh:
‎面对压力时的表现可不太好了
‎是不是 丽兹？

translation.en: …you couldn't save your brother from the Boogeyman.
translation.zh: ‎…你没能从妖魔怪手中救下你弟弟

translation.en: -[Kelly] You're gonna be okay. -[Liz] Go spray her.
translation.zh:
‎你不会有事的 ‎给你 快去喷她
‎试着别看那个迷魂猫眼坠

translation.en: Try not to look at the amulet.
translation.zh:
‎给你 快去喷她
‎试着别看那个迷魂猫眼坠

translation.en: I'm glad you girls stopped by.
Well, well, well. What do we have here?
What brings you to my neck of the woods?
Tell me, do you have any more brilliant observations,

translation.zh:
‎-你还有什么绝妙的观察吗？
‎-他在哪儿？

translation.en: I bet you didn't think you'd see me again.
translation.zh:
‎我猜你肯定没想到
‎你还会再次见到我吧

translation.en: ♪ Listen, you'll do as you're told ♪
[Grand Guignol] Did you really think you'd killed me?
That takes Angel Fire to the heart,
translation.zh: ‎那可需要将天使神火打入我的心脏

translation.en: and I don't suppose you brought any.
translation.zh: ‎你好像没有带什么天使神火吧

translation.en: -Whatever is the matter? -Cat's got her tongue.
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么了？
‎-她的舌头被猫叼走了

translation.en: -Now, Peggy, if you please-- -If I give you this…
translation.zh:
‎-好了 佩姬 麻烦你…
‎-如果我把这个给你…
‎就算是补偿了加德满都的那次任务

translation.en: and the cat-astrophe I caused there?
Absolutely, yes. And, as a bonus,
translation.zh: ‎当然了 必须的 还有额外的好处
‎各位美人 晚饭时间到了

translation.en: The Grand Guignol, he… he took Liz.
-Just head back to HQ. I've got a plan. -But what if Ms. Zellman comes home early?
translation.zh:
‎-回总部来 我有计划了
‎-要是泽尔曼女士提前回来怎么办？

translation.en: Don't worry. I already hacked into Ms. Zellman's phone and I'm tracking her.
translation.zh:
‎别担心
‎我已经侵入了泽尔曼女士的手机 ‎我在追踪她

translation.en: [sighs] Liz found this on the Toadie at the party.
translation.zh:
‎丽兹在派对上
‎发现蟆怪身上带着这个
‎蟆怪喜欢亮闪闪的东西 对吧？

translation.en: Well, maybe this piece of glass came from wherever he has Jacob?
translation.zh:
‎也许这片玻璃
‎就是从雅各布被关押的地方来的

translation.en: I'll run it through the database.
I got a match on the glass.
Yeah, but the Qeeqong Lighthouse is condemned.
translation.zh: ‎是的 但是昆冈灯塔已经被封闭了

translation.en: A perfect place for a Boogeyman to hide.
translation.zh: ‎那就是妖魔怪躲藏的绝佳地点

translation.en: This is the coup de grâce, my frenemy.
translation.zh: ‎这就是决定性的致命一击 我的友敌
‎今晚我玩得很开心 但是晚安吧

translation.en: I made it to the lighthouse.
In case I get lost, my sweater's tied to the fence.
translation.zh:
‎为了防止走丢
‎我把毛衣的一头勾在了栅栏上
‎凯莉 你不应该去那里的

‎-太危险了
‎-我必须要做点什么

translation.en: Oh, you should see your face.
translation.zh: ‎哦 你真该看看你自己的表情

translation.en: -[sings with choir] ♪ Do as you're told ♪ -No. No.
♪ Darling girl, let the monster inside ♪
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的女孩 放妖怪进来

translation.en: -♪ Take control, it's so right ♪ -No. Stop. Stop.
translation.zh:
‎-夺过控制权太合情理
‎-不 停下

translation.en: ♪ Long as you do as you're ♪
I sent your brother to a dark, spidery place, far, far away.
translation.zh:
‎我把你的弟弟派去了一个非常遥远
‎而且到处都是蜘蛛的黑暗的地方
‎好了 天使神火 开始制作吧！

translation.en: Time for some dragon skins. Right.
translation.zh: ‎该加入一些龙鳞了 好的

translation.en: And now, some kestrel eggs. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎然后 再来一些隼生的蛋 好的

translation.en: I may need some paper towel.
And now, first place for best costume goes to…
translation.zh: ‎最佳装扮奖的一等奖得主是…

translation.en: Red alert, SITs. Ms. Zellman's on the move!
translation.zh:
‎红色警报 实习生们
‎泽尔曼女士转移了！

translation.en: [Grand Guignol] Toadies, take care of her.
We need to get to the lighthouse right now.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在就需要赶到灯塔那里去

translation.en: But we don't have Angel Fire yet.
I lost track of Ms. Zellman!
At least it's afraid of light.
But… all the doors have electronic locks.
-No, no, no, no, wait. Wait, wait, wait. -[grumbling]
Wait, wait, wait, wait! I've got something even better.
You guys stay here and contain that monster.
translation.zh: ‎你们俩待在这里控制住这个妖怪

translation.en: -[hissing] -I'll bring the Angel Fire to Kelly.
-No one's ever contained a Shadow Monster! -If anyone can do it, it's you, Cass.
translation.zh:
‎-没有任何人能控制黑影游魂！
‎-如果有人能做到 就是你了 卡丝

translation.en: -That's your only way out. -[Berna] I got this.
translation.zh:
‎-那是你唯一的出口
‎-交给我吧

translation.en: [Cassie] The light from this glowfish will hold it back.
translation.zh: ‎这只发光鱼发出的光会阻止它前进的

translation.en: -Jacob's this way. Come with me. -Wait. I thought he was in there.
translation.zh: ‎雅各布在这边 跟我来 ‎慢着 我以为他在那里面

‎-这边走 凯莉
‎-我们要去哪儿？

‎-快来 凯莉
‎-我们要去哪儿？
‎哦 不 他把你催眠了

translation.en: I don't wanna hurt you. But I will. [grunts]
translation.zh:
‎我不想伤害你
‎但是如果逼不得已 我也没办法

translation.en: Remember your brother. Think about Kevin!
translation.zh: ‎想想你的弟弟吧 想一下凯文！

translation.en: I know you miss him, okay? I know that.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你思念他 好吗？我明白的

translation.en: You and I, we can beat this together! Just--
translation.zh: ‎我们俩可以一起打败敌人 你…

translation.en: -How do I know it's really you? -'Cause I'm gonna kick your butt
translation.zh:
‎-我怎么知道你真的是你自己了？
‎-因为如果你不扶我起来

translation.en: -if you don't help me up. -Yeah, it's you.
translation.zh:
‎-我就要狂揍你一顿
‎-好吧 真的是你本人

translation.en: -You tried to kill me, you know. -Shhh!
We have to be quiet, or he'll hear us.
translation.zh:
‎我们必须要安静一点
‎否则会被他听到的

translation.en: -[Curtis] We're gonna die. -[Cassie] Not if I hot-wire the circuit.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要没命了
‎-除非我能短接启动电路

translation.en: -[Shadow Monster hissing] -[Cassie] How much time do I have?
[whispers] I have no idea where he went.
[Cassie] Okay. Plan B. Work with what you got.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 B计划 利用手头的东西

translation.en: I just need to hook this up to these batteries--
translation.zh: ‎我只需要将这些电池固定上

translation.en: -And then what? How do we catch a shadow? -[hissing]
translation.zh: ‎然后呢？我们要怎么抓住一个影子？

translation.en: -[gasps] That'll contain it. -[Cassie] But how do we get it in there?
translation.zh:
‎-那就能控制住它
‎-但我们怎么把它赶进去？

translation.en: If we move together, we can rope him into it!
translation.zh:
‎如果我们一起行动
‎就能用绳子把它赶进去！

‎-好的
‎-拜托让这些灯亮起来吧

translation.en: Please, please, please, please. Please, please, please, please. Please, please…
-[Cassie] It's coming straight for us. -I'll go get the box.
translation.zh:
‎-它直直地冲着我们来了
‎-我去拿木箱

translation.en: -[Curtis] Okay. You need to come with me. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 你得跟我一起来
‎-好的

translation.en: -[Cassie] Hurry up! Hurry up! -[Curtis] I-- I'm going as fast as I can!
translation.zh: ‎快点！ ‎这已经是我最快的速度了

translation.en: [Curtis] Come on. We can do this.
You're gonna have to close the lid, but whatever you do,
translation.zh: ‎你必须要把盖子盖上 但是不论如何

translation.en: don't let him touch your hand.
Why? What happens if he touches my hand, Cassie?
translation.zh:
‎为什么？
‎如果他碰到我的手会怎么样 卡丝？

translation.en: -What happens if he touches my hand? -Just do it!
translation.zh:
‎为什么？
‎如果他碰到我的手会怎么样 卡丝？ ‎快点关上盖子！

translation.en: That is what happens when you break into HQ and mess with my friends.
translation.zh: ‎闯入总部 欺负我朋友就是这个下场

translation.en: We caught it! No one's ever caught a Shadow Monster before.
translation.zh:
‎我们抓到它了！
‎还从来没有人抓到过黑影游魂呢
‎太好了 我们是传奇人物！

translation.en: It's actually kinda cute. Can we keep him?
translation.zh: ‎其实还挺可爱的 我们能养它吗？

translation.en: I don't wanna keep him. I don't wanna…
I need you to deliver a message to my sister.
translation.zh: ‎我需要你给我姐姐转达一条消息

translation.en: He still thinks you're under his spell.
[Grand Guignol] Have you met my sister, Serena, The Spider Queen?
translation.zh: ‎如果你见过我的姐姐蜘蛛精后莎琳娜

translation.en: She thinks she's so cool and so evil,
translation.zh: ‎她觉得自己可酷炫可邪恶了

translation.en: just because she's the Queen of the Boogeypeople
translation.zh: ‎就是因为她是妖魔鬼怪的女王

translation.en: Just a stupid little dreamer, am I, sis?
translation.zh:
‎就是一个愚蠢的只会做梦的人
‎是吧 姐姐？

translation.en: Little brother will be in charge, with my army of nightmares
waiting to rip humanity to shreds!
How long have you been standing there?
Ah, whatever. Did you lock your little friend up?
translation.zh:
‎不管了
‎你把你的小伙伴关起来了吗？

translation.en: We'll make a fine monster-sitter out of you yet, Liz.
translation.zh:
‎你会成为一个非常优秀的
‎妖怪保姆的 丽兹

translation.en: After tonight, we'll be monstrously busy. Get it?
translation.zh: ‎今晚之后 ‎我们就会忙碌到成妖了 明白了吗？

translation.en: Grand Guignol, there's a problem with the back tank.
translation.zh: ‎恶梦魔 后排的罐子出了问题

translation.en: If one of the Toadies has fallen in again, I'm leaving them there. Come!
translation.zh:
‎如果某个蟆怪又掉进去了
‎我可不打算救它们出来了 走吧！
‎好孩子 雅各布 真是好孩子

translation.en: What are you talking about? It's working perfectly.
translation.zh: ‎你在说什么？明明一点问题都没有

translation.en: -My mistake, Grand Guignol. -Yes, it was, you stupid child.
translation.zh: ‎是我搞错了 恶梦魔 ‎是的 是你 愚蠢的小孩子

translation.en: The stench of your fear gave you away.
Did you really think you could sneak up on me?
translation.zh: ‎你真的以为你能偷偷接近我？
‎偷偷接近这件事就是我发明的

translation.en: By the Order of the Babysitters, I demand you give us Jacob.
translation.zh:
‎我以护童保姆国际学会的名义
‎命令你把雅各布交给我们

translation.en: By the Order of the Boogeyman, you're a blithering idiot.
translation.zh:
‎我以恶梦魔的名义表示
‎你是个胡言乱语的蠢蛋
‎柏娜 70度角 每秒11米的速度扔过来
‎是啊 ‎胳膊真不错 失败者

translation.en: Who do you think you're dealing with?
Master of Menace, Sultan of Suffering,
translation.zh: ‎威胁的主人 痛苦的苏丹

translation.en: And you're babysitters. I almost feel sorry for you.
translation.zh:
‎而你们只是一群保姆
‎我都有点同情你们了

translation.en: Release our new friends upon the world!
translation.zh:
‎把我们的新朋友
‎释放到这个世界中来吧！

translation.en: We've rehearsed this for six months!
Bare your teeth, my beautiful nightmares.
translation.zh:
‎露出你们的尖牙厉爪吧
‎美丽的恶梦们

translation.en: [scoffs] You didn't really think you had a chance to defeat me, did you?
translation.zh:
‎你们不会真的觉得
‎你们有机会打败我吧？

translation.en: Is that the best you've got? [laughs]
Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
It's okay, Jacob. He's gone. You're safe! Okay?
translation.zh:
‎没事的 雅各布
‎他走了 你安全了 好吗？

translation.en: Wait. Why are the nightmares still here?
translation.zh: ‎慢着 这些恶梦怎么还在？

translation.en: You don't need to be afraid anymore.
Tell 'em to take a hike, kid.
translation.zh: ‎叫它们都滚开吧 小朋友

translation.en: I'm not scared of you anymore.
[Ms. Zellman] Kelly, this is the sixth message I've left you.
translation.zh: ‎凯莉 这是我给你留的第六条留言了

translation.en: It's okay, Kelly. You don't have to check under the bed.
translation.zh: ‎没事的 凯莉 你不用检查我床底下了

translation.en: I think I'll have good dreams from now on.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我以后只会做美梦了

translation.en: I think you will too, bud.
-[car door opens and closes] -Look… you're not gonna tell your mom what happened tonight, right?
translation.zh:
‎听着 你不会告诉你妈妈
‎今晚发生了什么吧？

translation.en: -[front door opens] -Will you babysit me again?
[Ms. Zellman] Jacob! Jacob! Are you okay? Where are you?
I can't believe you got him to fall asleep. You're a lifesaver.
translation.zh:
‎我不敢相信你居然让他入睡了
‎你真是个大救星

translation.en: Listen, if you're not busy tomorrow night…
I wasn't gonna say that, but…
Seeing as you displayed courage and brains in the face of danger, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah…
translation.zh:
‎考虑到你在面临危险时
‎展现出了勇气和智慧之类之类的…

translation.en: I'm gonna talk to Mama Vee, and I'm gonna tell her
translation.zh: ‎我会和威大妈聊一下 告诉她

translation.en: you should at least be allowed to apply to the Order.
translation.zh: ‎至少应该允许你申请加入学会

translation.en: You still have to pass Heck Week.
